Uses of Interface
com.tangosol.net.NamedCollection.Option

  • Packages that use NamedCollection.Option 
    Package Description
    com.tangosol.net
    Contains basic cluster interfaces and factories.

    • Uses of NamedCollection.Option in com.tangosol.net

      Subinterfaces of NamedCollection.Option in com.tangosol.net 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ValueTypeAssertion<V>
      Defines a NamedTopic.Option for asserting the type of values used with a NamedTopic.
      Classes in com.tangosol.net that implement NamedCollection.Option 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ValueTypeAssertion.WithValueTypeAssertion<V>
      Defines a NamedTopic.Option for asserting the type of values used with a NamedTopic.
